p: Since December 21, 2019, China has been under the grip of a severe epidemic with cases even being reported at a rapid rate from neighboring countries like Japan, Thailand, South Korea, Nepal and India as well as far flung countries like the USA, the UK, Italy, Germany and France ( https://www.who.int>docs). The cause of this epidemic is a novel strain of coronavirus earlier temporarily designated by World Health Organization (WHO) as 2019-novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) 1, and the infection due to 2019-nCoV has been designated as COVID-19 (CO—corona, VI—virus, D—disease and 19 stands for 2019).
